description: Service management screens with comprehensive CRUD operations, category management, and modern responsive UI design

components.ServicesScreen: Comprehensive service management screen with category filtering, responsive design, and privileged operations integration.
components._EnhancedDeleteDialog: Security-enhanced delete confirmation dialog requiring exact service name typing for deletion confirmation.

rules: Comprehensive service management interface with dual-store architecture: ServiceManagementStore and ServiceCategoryStore integration.
Privileged operations integration requiring manager PIN authorization for all service modification operations.
Responsive grid layout with adaptive column count: 1 column (mobile), 2 columns (tablet), 3 columns (desktop).
Category pill filtering system with service count badges and visual selection feedback.
Modern Material Design card layout with professional styling, shadows, and rounded corners.
Advanced search functionality with real-time filtering across service names and category names.
Category-based service organization with expandable category cards and empty state handling.
Service CRUD operations with proper error handling, loading states, and user feedback.
Enhanced security delete dialog requiring exact service name typing for deletion confirmation.
StandardAppHeader integration with search capabilities and dual action buttons (Add Category, Add Service).
MobX Observer optimization with granular reactive scope for efficient UI updates.
Service card design with price badges, duration indicators, and context menu actions.
Professional empty state handling for categories without services with call-to-action buttons.
Color-coded category system with icon integration and consistent visual theming.
Service form dialog integration with category preselection and validation workflows.
Memory management with proper TextEditingController disposal in widget lifecycle.
Professional service management workflow supporting creation, modification, and deletion operations.
Responsive layout calculations with LayoutBuilder for optimal display across device sizes.
Service count tracking and display with real-time updates reflecting current service inventory.
Business security model requiring manager authorization for inventory modifications preventing unauthorized changes.
